channel.title: Slow Download of Mod Manager
channel.description:
*(I don't know if this is the correct category to say this but I'm gonna put it here. It's also my first time in this forum so cut me some slack.)*
I've tried everything but it still downloads super slow, any fix? It looks like it only happens in the Mod Manager that I'm downloading. The download time goes from minutes to hours to the point that it errors. Is it my internet connection or the download itself?

item.title: Slow Download of Mod Manager
item.dc:creator: @Robb Rob B
item.description:
@Robb wrote:

The download is hosted by Github, and whatever the issue is appears to be on their end. Some people have had better success downloading it over a VPN connection or over cellular data instead of their usual connection.

Read full topic

Super SLOW… its now at 1,1KB/s lol
